data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 156,600 people living in Jarash through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jarash, Jordan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Jarash, Jordan that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Jarash, Jordan that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Jarash unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Romani, Domari people.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Jarash words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Jarash. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Jarash be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.
